sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a purchase order in SAP ECC – RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • PO Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Company Code - Sample Input : 1000.
    • Purchasing Document Type - Sample Input : NB.
    • Item Number Interval - Sample Input : 10.
    • Vendor [ VENDOR ] - Sample Input : AGENCY00.
    • Purchasing Organization - Sample Input : 1000.
    • Purchasing Group - Sample Input : 001.
    • Purchasing Document
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Status
    • Created On
    • Created By
    • Language Key
    • ISO Code for Language Key
    • Terms of Payment
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT1_TO ]
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT2_TO ]
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT3_TO ]
    • Cash Discount Percentage 1
    • Cash Discount Percentage 2
    • Currency
    • ISO Code Currency
    • Exchange Rate
    • Exchange Rate Fixed

    • Start of Validity Period
    • End of Validity Period

    • Limit on Service Packages Exists

    • Percentage for Price Determination [ CONT_PERC ]

    • Package Number
    • Internal Line Number
    • Line Number
    • Hierarchy Level of Group
    • Outline Level
    • Outline Line Indicator
    • Subpackage Number
    • Activity Number

    • Edition of Service Type

    • Upper Limit

    • Wage Type

    • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_PCKG ]
    • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_LINE ]
    • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_PCKG ]
    • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_LINE ]

    • Entry: Unplanned, Limit Line

    • Alternatives: Reference to Basic Item
    • Basic Line
    • Alternative Line
    • Bidder's Line
    • Supplementary Line
    • Line with Open Quantity

    • Date
    • Start Time
    • End Time
    • External Personnel Number
    • Formula Number
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL1 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL2 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL3 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL4 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL5 ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF1_NUM ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF2_NUM ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF1_TXT ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF2_TXT ]
    • Hierarchically Superior Line Number
    • External Reference Key for Service
    • Period of Performance Start Date
    • Period of Performance End Date
    • SRM Reference Key
    • Item Key for eSOA Messages
    • Net Value
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Purchase Order - Purchase order document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a purchase order in SAP ECC – RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • PO Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Company Code - Sample Input : 1000.
    • Purchasing Document Type - Sample Input : NB.
    • Item Number Interval - Sample Input : 10.
    • Vendor [ VENDOR ] - Sample Input : AGENCY00.
    • Purchasing Organization - Sample Input : 1000.
    • Purchasing Group - Sample Input : 001.
    • Purchasing Document
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Status
    • Created On
    • Created By
    • Language Key
    • ISO Code for Language Key
    • Terms of Payment
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT1_TO ]
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT2_TO ]
    • Cash (Prompt Payment) Discount Days [ DSCNT3_TO ]
    • Cash Discount Percentage 1
    • Cash Discount Percentage 2
    • Currency
    • ISO Code Currency
    • Exchange Rate
    • Exchange Rate Fixed
    • Document Date
    • Start of Validity Period
    • End of Validity Period
    • Warranty
    • Quotation
    • Quotation Date

    • Salesperson
    • Telephone
    • Supplying Vendor
    • Customer
    • Outline agreement
    • GR Message
    • Supplying Plant
    • Incoterms
    • Incoterms (Part 2)
    • Collective Number
    • Invoicing Party
    • Our Reference
    • Logical System
    • Subitem Interval
    • Release Indicator
    • Release State
    • Country of Sales Tax ID Number
    • ISO Country Tax
    • Reason for Cancellation
    • Reason Code
    • Retention
    • Retention in Percent
    • Down Payment
    • Down Payment Amount in BAPI
    • Down Payment Percentage
    • Due Date for Down Payment
    • Incomplete
    • Incompleteness
    • Shipping Type
    • Handover Location
    • Shipping Conditions
    • Incoterms Version
    • Incoterms Location 1
    • Incoterms Location 2
  • Purchase Order Items- Objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number - Sample Input : 00010.
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Short Text
    • Material [ MATERIAL ]
    • Material Number [ MATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATERIAL ]
    • Version Number [ MATERIAL_VERSION ]
    • Material [ EMATERIAL ]
    • Material Number [ EMATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ EMATERIAL_GUID ]

    • Underdelivery Tolerance Limit

    • Principal Purchase Agreement Item

    • Incoterms Location 2
    • Material [ MATERIAL_LONG ]
    • EMaterial [ EMATERIAL_LONG ]
  • PO Accounts- Objects containing these fields:
    • Item
    • Sequential Number of Account Assignment
    • Quantity
    • G/L Account
    • Business Area
    • Cost Center
    • Sales Document
    • Sales Document Item
    • Schedule Line Number

    • Work Breakdown Structure Element
  • Addresses For Inward Delivery- Objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Address Number

    • C/O Name
    • City
    • District
    • Postal Code
    • PO Box
    • Street
    • Building Code
    • Floor
    • Country Key
    • Region
    • Telephone Number
  • Purchase Order Schedule - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Schedule Line Number
    • Delivery Date Category
    • Delivery Date
    • Scheduled Quantity
    • Time
    • Statistics Relevant Delivery Date
    • Purchase Requisition
    • Item of Purchase Requisition
    • Purchase Order Date
    • Route Schedule
    • Material Availability Date
    • Material Staging Time
    • Loading Date
    • Loading Time
    • Transportation Planning Date
    • Transportation Planning Time
    • Goods Issue Date
    • Goods Issue Time
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Closed
    • Goods Receipt End Date
    • Goods Receipt End Time
    • Committed Quantity
    • Committed date
    • Geographical Route
    • Handover Date
    • Handover Time
  • PO Limits - Objects containing these fields:
    • Package Number
    • Overall Limit
    • No Limit
    • Expected value
    • Limits Exist for Service Types
    • Limit on Contract Items Exists
    • Limit on Service Packages Exists
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Free Limit
    • No Limit
    • Short Description of Service Type
    • Edition of Service Type
    • Value Limits on Service Types
    • No Limit on Standard Service Type
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Percentage for Price Determination
    • Number of a Set of Model Service Specifications
    • Limits on Model Service Specifications
    • No Limit on Model Specifications
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Percentage for Price Determination [ TMP_PERC ]
    • Percentage for Price Determination [ CONT_PERC ]
  • PO Service Lines - Objects containing these fields:
    • Package Number
    • Internal Line Number
    • Line Number
    • Hierarchy Level of Group
    • Outline Level
    • Outline Line Indicator
    • Subpackage Number
    • Activity Number
    • Short Description of Service Type
    • Edition of Service Type
    • Standard Service Catalog Item
    • Vendor's Service Number
    • Quantity with Sign
    • Base Unit of Measure
    • ISO Code for Unit of Measurement
    • Overfulfillment Tolerance
    • Unlimited Overfulfillment
    • Price Unit
    • Gross Price
    • Lower Limit
    • Upper Limit
    • Short Text
    • Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment
    • Personnel Number
    • Wage Type
    • Source Package Number
    • Entry: Planned Package Line
    • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_PCKG ]
    • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_LINE ]
    • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_PCKG ]
    • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_LINE ]
    • Service Line Refers to Standard Service Catalog Limits
    • Entry: Unplanned, Limit Line
    • Target Value
    • Alternatives: Reference to Basic Item
    • Basic Line
    • Alternative Line
    • Bidder's Line
    • Supplementary Line
    • Line with Open Quantity
    • Informatory Line
    • Blanket Line
    • Contingency Line
    • Tax on Sales/Purchases Code
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Material Group
    • Date
    • Start Time
    • End Time
    • External Personnel Number
    • Formula Number
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL1 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL2 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL3 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL4 ]
    • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL5 ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF1_NUM ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF2_NUM ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF1_TXT ]
    • User Defined Field [ USERF2_TXT ]
    • Hierarchically Superior Line Number
    • External Reference Key for Service
    • Period of Performance Start Date
    • Period of Performance End Date
    • SRM Reference Key
    • Item Key for eSOA Messages
    • Net Value
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Purchase Order - Purchase order document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
